channel.title: GBScape
channel.description:
[center][size=32pt][shadow=yellow,left][font=verdana]GBScape[/font][/shadow][/size] [size=18pt][font=verdana]Good or bad, Thats the feeling in GBScape[/font][/size]
[b]Information[/b]
The GBScape Exp is different because we got 2 worlds, In World 1 are the settings; 30x Exp 35x Money (Roling-Play). In world 2 are the settings; 90x Exp 100x Money,
[b]Features[/b] -Starter interface (Where you can choose witch class you wanna be) -The Evil skill (Custom) -The Good skill (Custom) -All 21 skills getting to work -5 New minigames -And much more!
[b]Pictures[/b] [img]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/6350/client.png[/img]
[b]About[/b] GBScape stands for:"Good-Bad-Scape, In GBScape there are 2 classes the first class is the evil side if you choose this class you will go to the underworld under runescape you will need to fight against the good class. The second class is the Good side if you choose this class you will go to the beautifull land of zanaris and you need to fight against the evil class. [/center]

item.title: GBScape
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Xreaper ur right sorry i was a bit pissed off…
And i wont give up until this server is done…

thought about doing something like this before. goodluck
Thank you

Read full topic

item.title: GBScape
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Lewis), post:6, topic:326936”][quote author=C4ll3r link=topic=423343.msg3108292#msg3108292 date=1264347821]

GBScape is a Deltascape base and we use a bluurr client! soo you will see much custom interfaces![/quote]

From this I can tell this will be a fail server.

You dont know, Dont give stupid comments if we’re not done yet

It’s not a stupid comment, it’s the truth…

It will fail like the rest of DeltaScape’s - just look at the status page, about 9/10 of them are Delta and they all look the same.[/quote]You can’t judge a server’s success based on it’s source right away. Everyone during my time was using Allstar and complaining about it’s over-usage, yet when I released it was raw as hell. IIRC, I was on the top 10 viewed and replied in moparscape. Allstar scape is a worse base than Delta, so where’s your logic there?..

[quote=“C4ll3r, post:16, topic:326936”]What should i make then a allstarscape…

And i can better call this post your anger here thread
If you wanna have a new source to leech just say that then![/quote]Ignore them, just continue your development. I’m sure if you pursue it as much as you want, it will turn out great.

Read full topic

item.title: GBScape
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

[center][size=32pt][shadow=yellow,left][font=verdana]GBScape[/font][/shadow][/size]
[size=18pt][font=verdana]Good or bad, Thats the feeling in GBScape[/font][/size]

Information

The GBScape Exp is different because we got 2 worlds, In World 1 are the settings; 30x Exp 35x Money (Roling-Play).
In world 2 are the settings; 90x Exp 100x Money,

Features
-Starter interface (Where you can choose witch class you wanna be)
-The Evil skill (Custom)
-The Good skill (Custom)
-All 21 skills getting to work
-5 New minigames
-And much more!

Pictures

About
GBScape stands for:"Good-Bad-Scape,
In GBScape there are 2 classes the first class is the evil side if you choose this class you will go to the underworld under runescape you will need to fight against the good class.
The second class is the Good side if you choose this class you will go to the beautifull land of zanaris and you need to fight against the evil class.
[/center]
